attributes.action: TELL US WHY there is ANY discussion over MPs pay when government policy is a 1% limit on public employees.
attributes.additional_details: And while there is not a lot that one can say with certainty about what MPs are, the one thing anyboy can say with ABSOLUTE CERTAINTY is that THEY ARE PUBLIC EMPLOYEES.  So tell us why we are even discussing them getting more than the 1% in line with government policy.
